sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' const ShopItemFunc = ({brand,title,description,descriptionFull,currency,price}) => { return (

{item.brand}

{item.title}

{item.description}

{item.descriptionFull}
{item.currency}{item.price.toFixed(2)}
) } ShopItemFunc.propTypes = { brand: PropTypes.string.isRequired, title: PropTypes.string.isRequired, description: PropTypes.string, descriptionFull: PropTypes.string, price: PropTypes.number, currency: PropTypes.string, } ShopItemFunc.defaultProps = { description: "Description of this item unavailable now", } export default ShopItemFunc
